keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
keywords.name: subject

byline.original: By MARK MAZZETTI and GARDINER HARRIS

lead_paragraph: At the White House, the president gave the highest military honor to Senior Chief Special Warfare Operator Edward Byers for bravery in Afghanistan.

headline.print_headline: Top Honor for SEAL Rescuer Who Wrestled Gunman and Shielded Hostage
headline.main: SEAL Who Wrestled Gunman and Shielded Hostage Is Awarded Medal of Honor

snippet: At the White House, the president gave the highest military honor to Senior Chief Special Warfare Operator Edward Byers for bravery in Afghanistan.
abstract: Pres Obama awards Medal of Honor to Edward C Byers Jr, Navy SEAL team member who rushed through gunfire inside Taliban compound in Afghanistan in 2012 to rescue American hostage Dr Dilip Joseph.
